All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class RecoveredTransactionReplayer
extends java.lang.Thread

Threaded object used to replay phase 2 of the commit protocol in a background thread.

swapResource

public final void swapResource(Uid rcUid,
                               Resource r)
Swap an old Resource that was registered with the transaction for a new one. The old one is identified by its RecoveryCoordinaor that was returned when the Resource was registered. The second parameter is the new Resouce.

replayPhase2

public final void replayPhase2()
Starts the thread to replay phase 2 of the transaction in the background.
